data.title: Wiley Represents VCY America in Acquisition of Wilmington, DE Radio Station from Beasley Media
data.meta_description: Wiley Represents VCY America in Acquisition of Wilmington, DE Radio Station from Beasley Media
data.text:
Washington, DC â€“ Wiley Rein LLP represented VCY America, Inc., in its acquisition of Wilmington, DE radio station WJBR-FM 99.5 from Beasley Media Group. Following completion of the $5 million transaction on October 5, 2023, VCY America changed the call sign to WVCW and began operating the station under a non-commercial FM license serving the Wilmington and Philadelphia markets.

The Wiley team advising VCY America was led by Corporate partner Jerita L. DeBraux Salley, who served as deal counsel, and Telecom, Media & Technology partners Wayne D. Johnsen and Kathryne C. Dickerson, who served as regulatory counsel.
